channel.title: Npc and player dialog
channel.description:
Hey everyone, Andrew here with a quick question for all you server buffs. Im working on learning more about the classic delta and I have come across a problem with npc and player dialog, when I talk to an npc for the quests that im trying to add the talking npc head gets shattered into little specs. Can anyone help me out with this problem? Thanks in advance - Andrew
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/30wp5j9.jpg[/img]

item.title: Npc and player dialog
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Rash:

Are you trying to get the npc to do an expression?

No I just added in dialog and I was wondering if anyone could tell me were the animations for the npcâ€™s expressions is located in a delta server? Like if I were to change the emotion. Also if anyone had a list of the emotions that would be wonderful (:
